ul.li: ‚úì Barcode Products Defined - Go to: Configuration > Barcode Management > Barcode Products
‚úì Customer Volume Data - Analyze monthly barcode usage patterns
‚úì Pricing Strategy - Define volume discount model (bronze/silver/gold tiers)

ol.li: Click Create to add new pricing tier
Enter Tier Name: Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum (or custom)
Set Minimum Quantity: Barcodes/month required to qualify
Set Maximum Quantity: Upper limit for this tier (or leave blank for unlimited)
Enter Price Per Barcode: Cost per unit at this volume
Or enter Discount Percentage: % off standard pricing (e.g., 10% for Silver)
Select Barcode Type: Storage box, shred bin, document label (or All)
Set Start Date and End Date for seasonal/promotional pricing
Choose Customer Type: Standard, Premium, Enterprise (or All)
Activate Auto-Apply to automatically assign tier based on monthly usage
System monitors customer usage, auto-upgrades/downgrades tier monthly
Invoices auto-calculate using tier pricing for billing period

field.p:
üöÄ Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Volume-Based Discounts: Reward high-volume customers with automatic savings
‚Ä¢ Auto-Tier Assignment: System monitors usage, upgrades/downgrades tier monthly
‚Ä¢ Type-Specific Pricing: Different rates for storage boxes vs shred bins
‚Ä¢ Customer Segmentation: Special tiers for enterprise vs standard customers
‚Ä¢ Seasonal Pricing: Date-based pricing for promotions or peak seasons
‚Ä¢ Invoice Integration: Auto-applies tier pricing on monthly invoices
‚Ä¢ Tier Analytics: Track customer distribution across tiers, revenue by tier

üí° Pro Tips:
‚Ä¢ Set overlapping date ranges to test new pricing before removing old
‚Ä¢ Use Customer Type filter to offer enterprise discounts without lowering standard pricing
‚Ä¢ Review customer tier distribution quarterly - adjust minimums to balance tiers
‚Ä¢ Enable Auto-Apply for hassle-free tier management (customers auto-upgrade)
‚Ä¢ Communicate tier benefits to customers - incentivizes increased usage
